item.title: Markdown demo
item.description: I am using my own customized Hugo theme using W3 CSS. If you like my theme and would like to explore more, here’s a quick example of some Markdown text syntax and what it looks like when rendered to HTML.

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
My name is Robin Černín and I live and work currently in Brisbane, Australia. My career has been previously focused on Information Security. I am currently working as Principal Software Maintenance Engineer in Red Hat with Cloud Computing software OpenStack.

My favourite programming and scripting languages are Go, MySQL, Python, Bash, HTML and CSS.
